Key Match Events: India won by 6 wickets with 15 balls remaining.
Shivam Dube scored an unbeaten 60 off 38 balls.
Jitesh Sharma impressed with 31 off 20 balls.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman took 2 wickets for 21 runs.
Axar Patel took 2 wickets for 23 runs.
Mukesh Kumar took 2 wickets for 33 runs.
Rohit Sharma was run out for a duck in the first over.
Shubman Gill scored 23 off 12 balls before being stumped.
Mohammad Nabi top-scored for Afghanistan with 42 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: India's coach Rahul Dravid had locked in Yashasvi Jaiswal and Rohit Sharma as India's first-choice openers for this T20I series.
Virat Kohli was unavailable for this match for personal reasons.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in chilly conditions in Mohali.
Mohammad Nabi turned 39 earlier this month and his son recently made his Under-19 debut for Afghanistan.
